name: Rooftops Settlement Simulator - Demo
description:
This Demo was made for the Sim Jam. I wanted to see if i could make a simulation/strategy game with Visionaire Studio, which is primarily suited to make Point and click adventure games. The answer is, yes, theoretically. But it ´s going to take way longer than a two week game jam to really have something i could call a game. Right now it´s only a proof of concept.

You can see what the game would look like, you can build 2 kinds of buildings and the corresponding values will change. There is a test expedition map and a test settlement to visit. And that´s pretty much it. 

The game is  taking place in the same universe as my Rooftops game.

Planned features:

  • More buildings
  • Scavenging hunts(pretty much treasure hunts ), those would be small Point and Click adventure parts
  • A bigger map to explore
  • Diplomacy missions, help other settlements to get Resources, items or get them to  join you
  • Victory conditions(Explorer Victory, Settlement Victory, Scavenging Victory)
  • and more...

Right-clicking changes the cursor, in the demo this is only really necessary while visiting the other settlement.
